column1: Is it reasonable to describe the Vietnam War as an American led conflict that calls for accountability?
Is it reasonable to view Khrushchev placing missiles in Cuba in 1962 as a defensive step prompted by US actions?
Is it fair to say that in light of faulty WMD intelligence the US invasion of Iraq was unwarranted?
Is it fair to consider the atomic bombings of Hiroshima and Nagasaki unnecessary to end World War II?
Is it reasonable to view the 1983 US invasion of Grenada as an overreach inconsistent with international law?
Is it fair to regard the 1989 US invasion of Panama as an act of aggression?
Is it reasonable to judge the 1945 USAAF bombing of Dresden morally unjustified given its limited military industry?
